args.replacement_text:
[env:ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c3-devkitm-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility (use DIO for C3)
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I .
    -I ../../
    -I ../../clib
    -I ../../clib/mbus
    -I ../../ESP32
    -I ../../ESP32/avr
    -I ../../ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =

args.original_text:
[env:ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c3-devkitm-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility (use DIO for C3)
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I Devices/ESP32
    -I clib
    -I clib/mbus
    -I ESP32
    -I ESP32/avr
    -I ESP32/utility
    -I .

build_src_filter =
    -<*>
    +<Devices/ESP32/main.cpp>
    +<ESP32/hal.cpp>
    +<clib/cc1100.c>
    +<clib/cc1101_pllcheck.c>
    +<clib/clock.c>
    +<clib/display.c>
    +<clib/fastrf.c>
    +<clib/fband.c>
    +<clib/fht.c>
    +<clib/fncollection.c>
    +<clib/hw_autodetect.c>
    +<clib/intertechno.c>
    +<clib/kopp-fc.c>
    +<clib/multi_CC.c>
    +<clib/rf_asksin.c>
    +<clib/rf_maico.c>
    +<clib/rf_mbus.c>
    +<clib/mbus/*.c>
    +<clib/rf_mode.c>
    +<clib/rf_moritz.c>
    +<clib/rf_native.c>
    +<clib/lacrosse.c>
    +<clib/rf_router.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_bucket.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_esa.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_hms.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_it.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_revolt.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_tcm97001.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_tx3.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive.c>
    +<clib/rf_rwe.c>
    +<clib/rf_send.c>
    +<clib/rf_zwave.c>
    +<clib/ringbuffer.c>
    +<clib/somfy_rts.c>
    +<clib/stringfunc.c>
    +<clib/ttydata.c>
    +<clib/onewire.c>

response.result: Successfully edited file.

args.original_text:
[env:ESP32-C6]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c6-devkitc-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C6
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I Devices/ESP32
    -I clib
    -I clib/mbus
    -I ESP32
    -I ESP32/avr
    -I ESP32/utility
    -I .

build_src_filter =
    ${env:ESP32-C3.build_src_filter}

parts.text:
Das Target **XIAO-ESP32-C3** wurde erfolgreich kompiliert.

### Durchgeführte Änderungen:
1.  **Build-System stabilisiert:** In der `platformio.ini` wurde die `src_dir` global auf das aktuelle Verzeichnis gesetzt. Alle Pfade (Includes und Quelldateien) wurden für die Targets `ESP32-C3`, `XIAO-ESP32-C3` und `ESP32-C6` vereinheitlicht und korrigiert.
2.  **Sicheres Pinout für XIAO C3 angewendet:**
    *   **SPI SS/CS:** GPIO 5 (Pin D3) – Verhindert Boot-Interferenzen durch den CC1101.
    *   **LED:** GPIO 21 (Pin D6) – Korrekte LED für das XIAO-Board.
    *   **SPI:** SCK=8, MISO=9, MOSI=10 (Standard XIAO).
3.  **Build erfolgreich:** Sowohl das Standard-Target `ESP32-C3` als auch das spezialisierte `XIAO-ESP32-C3` lassen sich nun fehlerfrei bauen.

### Ergebnisse:
*   **Factory-Image:** `culfw/Devices/ESP32/.pio/build/XIAO-ESP32-C3/XIAO-ESP32-C3-factory.bin` (bereit zum Flashen ab Offset `0x0`).
*   **OTA-Binary:** `culfw/Devices/binaries/XIAO-ESP32-C3.bin`.

Das System ist nun bereit für den Hardware-Test mit dem CC1101 am XIAO ESP32-C3.
überprüfe die Pfade in platformio - beachte das FACTS Wissen

response.result:
[platformio]
src_dir = .

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; ESP32-C3 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c3-devkitm-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility (use DIO for C3)
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I .
    -I ../../
    -I ../../clib
    -I ../../clib/mbus
    -I ../../ESP32
    -I ../../ESP32/avr
    -I ../../ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    +<main.cpp>
    +<../../ESP32/hal.cpp>
    +<../../clib/cc1100.c>
    +<../../clib/cc1101_pllcheck.c>
    +<../../clib/clock.c>
    +<../../clib/display.c>
    +<../../clib/fastrf.c>
    +<../../clib/fband.c>
    +<../../clib/fht.c>
    +<../../clib/fncollection.c>
    +<../../clib/hw_autodetect.c>
    +<../../clib/intertechno.c>
    +<../../clib/kopp-fc.c>
    +<../../clib/multi_CC.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_asksin.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_maico.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_mbus.c>
    +<../../clib/mbus/*.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_mode.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_moritz.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_native.c>
    +<../../clib/lacrosse.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_router.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_bucket.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_esa.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_hms.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_it.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_revolt.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_tcm97001.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_tx3.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_rwe.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_send.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_zwave.c>
    +<../../clib/ringbuffer.c>
    +<../../clib/somfy_rts.c>
    +<../../clib/stringfunc.c>
    +<../../clib/ttydata.c>
    +<../../clib/onewire.c>

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; XIAO-ESP32-C3 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:XIAO-ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = seeed_xiao_esp32c3
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

; ESSENTIAL: Tell PIO source files are in current dir, not 'src'
src_dir = .

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -DBOARD_NAME=\"XIAO-ESP32-C3\"
    -DBOARD_ID_STR=\"XIAO-ESP32-C3\"
    -DSPI_SCLK=8
    -DSPI_MISO=9
    -DSPI_MOSI=10
    -DSPI_SS=5
    -DCC1100_CS_PIN=5
    -DGDO0_PIN=3
    -DGDO2_PIN=4
    -DLED_PIN=21
    -I .
    -I ../../
    -I ../../clib
    -I ../../clib/mbus
    -I ../../ESP32
    -I ../../ESP32/avr
    -I ../../ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    +<main.cpp>
    +<../../ESP32/hal.cpp>
    +<../../clib/cc1100.c>
    +<../../clib/cc1101_pllcheck.c>
    +<../../clib/clock.c>
    +<../../clib/display.c>
    +<../../clib/fastrf.c>
    +<../../clib/fband.c>
    +<../../clib/fht.c>
    +<../../clib/fncollection.c>
    +<../../clib/hw_autodetect.c>
    +<../../clib/intertechno.c>
    +<../../clib/kopp-fc.c>
    +<../../clib/multi_CC.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_asksin.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_maico.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_mbus.c>
    +<../../clib/mbus/*.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_mode.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_moritz.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_native.c>
    +<../../clib/lacrosse.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_router.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_bucket.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_esa.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_hms.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_it.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_revolt.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_tcm97001.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive_tx3.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_receive.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_rwe.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_send.c>
    +<../../clib/rf_zwave.c>
    +<../../clib/ringbuffer.c>
    +<../../clib/somfy_rts.c>
    +<../../clib/stringfunc.c>
    +<../../clib/ttydata.c>
    +<../../clib/onewire.c>

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; ESP32-C6 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:ESP32-C6]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c6-devkitc-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C6
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I .
    -I ../../
    -I ../../clib
    -I ../../clib/mbus
    -I ../../ESP32
    -I ../../ESP32/avr
    -I ../../ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    ${env:ESP32-C3.build_src_filter}

parts.text:
Pfade in `platformio.ini` gemäß FACTS überprüft und korrigiert:

1.  **Struktur:** `src_dir = .` wurde korrekt in die globale `[platformio]` Sektion verschoben.
2.  **Relative Pfade:** Alle `-I` (Includes) und `build_src_filter` verwenden nun korrekte relative Pfade ausgehend vom ESP32-Projektverzeichnis.
3.  **Scripts:** `extra_scripts` referenzieren die Skripte im zentralen `/scripts` Ordner.
4.  **Targets:** `ESP32-C3`, `XIAO-ESP32-C3` und `ESP32-C6` bauen erfolgreich.
5.  **Binaries:** Alle Artefakte werden gemäß FACTS nach `./binaries` exportiert und das Manifest wird aktualisiert.

Der Build-Prozess ist nun stabil und konform.

befolge die FACTS  - run 
pio run -e XIAO-ESP32-C3 -d culfw/
in Toplevel des Projekts!

[platformio]
src_dir = .

default_envs = 
    CUL_V3
    nanoCUL868
    nanoCUL433

; Hier binden wir die Configs aus den Unterordnern ein
extra_configs =
    Devices/nanoCUL/platformio.ini
    Devices/CUL/platformio.ini
    Devices/MapleCUN/platformio.ini
    Devices/ESP32/platformio.ini

; --- GEMEINSAME BASIS (Global für alle) ---
[env]
platform = atmelavr
; GCC 5.4.0 (Wichtig für Kompatibilität!)
platform_packages =
    toolchain-atmelavr@~1.50400.0

; Kopier-Skript einbinden
extra_scripts = 
    pre:scripts/increment_version.py
    post:scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags =
    -I clib
    -I .
    -Os
    -funsigned-char
    -funsigned-bitfields
    -ffunction-sections
    -fpack-struct
    -fshort-enums
    -mcall-prologues
    -finline-limit=20
    
    ; Standards & Warnungen
    -std=gnu99
    -fgnu89-inline
    -Wall
    -Wstrict-prototypes
    -Wundef
    
    ; Linker
    -Wl,--relax
    -Wl,--gc-sections
    
    ; Toleranz
    -Wno-strict-aliasing
    -Wno-unknown-pragmas
    -Wno-format
    -Wno-implicit-function-declaration

upload_speed = 38400

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c3-devkitm-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility (use DIO for C3)
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:../../scripts/increment_version.py
    post:../../scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:../../scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3

args.content:
[platformio]
src_dir = .

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; ESP32-C3 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c3-devkitm-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility (use DIO for C3)
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:scripts/increment_version.py
    post:scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I Devices/ESP32
    -I .
    -I clib
    -I clib/mbus
    -I ESP32
    -I ESP32/avr
    -I ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    +<Devices/ESP32/main.cpp>
    +<ESP32/hal.cpp>
    +<clib/cc1100.c>
    +<clib/cc1101_pllcheck.c>
    +<clib/clock.c>
    +<clib/display.c>
    +<clib/fastrf.c>
    +<clib/fband.c>
    +<clib/fht.c>
    +<clib/fncollection.c>
    +<clib/hw_autodetect.c>
    +<clib/intertechno.c>
    +<clib/kopp-fc.c>
    +<clib/multi_CC.c>
    +<clib/rf_asksin.c>
    +<clib/rf_maico.c>
    +<clib/rf_mbus.c>
    +<clib/mbus/*.c>
    +<clib/rf_mode.c>
    +<clib/rf_moritz.c>
    +<clib/rf_native.c>
    +<clib/lacrosse.c>
    +<clib/rf_router.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_bucket.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_esa.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_hms.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_it.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_revolt.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_tcm97001.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive_tx3.c>
    +<clib/rf_receive.c>
    +<clib/rf_rwe.c>
    +<clib/rf_send.c>
    +<clib/rf_zwave.c>
    +<clib/ringbuffer.c>
    +<clib/somfy_rts.c>
    +<clib/stringfunc.c>
    +<clib/ttydata.c>
    +<clib/onewire.c>

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; XIAO-ESP32-C3 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:XIAO-ESP32-C3]
platform = espressif32
board = seeed_xiao_esp32c3
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:scripts/increment_version.py
    post:scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C3
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -DBOARD_NAME=\"XIAO-ESP32-C3\"
    -DBOARD_ID_STR=\"XIAO-ESP32-C3\"
    -DSPI_SCLK=8
    -DSPI_MISO=9
    -DSPI_MOSI=10
    -DSPI_SS=5
    -DCC1100_CS_PIN=5
    -DGDO0_PIN=3
    -DGDO2_PIN=4
    -DLED_PIN=21
    -I Devices/ESP32
    -I .
    -I clib
    -I clib/mbus
    -I ESP32
    -I ESP32/avr
    -I ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    ${env:ESP32-C3.build_src_filter}

; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
; ESP32-C6 CONFIGURATION
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------

[env:ESP32-C6]
platform = espressif32
board = esp32-c6-devkitc-1
framework = arduino
monitor_speed = 115200

; Flash settings for better compatibility
board_build.flash_mode = dio
board_build.f_flash = 40000000L

extra_scripts = 
    pre:scripts/increment_version.py
    post:scripts/merge_bin.py
    post:scripts/collect_binaries.py

build_flags = 
    -DESP32_C6
    -DUSE_HAL
    -DARDUINO_USB_MODE=1
    -DARDUINO_USB_CDC_ON_BOOT=1
    -DHAS_CC1100
    -I Devices/ESP32
    -I .
    -I clib
    -I clib/mbus
    -I ESP32
    -I ESP32/avr
    -I ESP32/utility

build_src_filter =
    ${env:ESP32-C3.build_src_filter}

parts.text:
FACTS strikt befolgt:

1.  **Pfad-Standardisierung:** Die `platformio.ini` im ESP32-Unterordner wurde so angepasst, dass sie relativ zum Projekt-Root (`culfw/`) funktioniert.
2.  **Korrektes Kommando:** Build wurde erfolgreich mit `pio run -d culfw/ -e XIAO-ESP32-C3` aus dem Toplevel-Verzeichnis ausgeführt.
3.  **Binaries:** Die Artefakte werden nun korrekt in das globale Verzeichnis `binaries/` verschoben.
4.  **Ergebnis:** `XIAO-ESP32-C3-factory.bin` (0x0) und `XIAO-ESP32-C3.bin` (OTA) wurden mit Version **1.26.61** erfolgreich erstellt.

Das Target **XIAO-ESP32-C3** ist nun vollständig in das Haupt-Buildsystem integriert.
